Experiment 1 Predicting when there will be a high risk of Forest Fires in the Fall

    1. WetSpring ? DrySummer ? FireInFall (stop when 8 of 8 correct)




    2. A ??WetSpring (stop when 23 of 24 correct)




    3. B???C ? DrySummmer (stop when 23 of 24 correct)
    4. Logical A ? (B???C) ? FireInFall Feature C ? (B ??A) ? FireInFall
    • Measured Trials until 23 of 24 correct on Phase 4
    • Total number of errors on Phase 4
